sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>sn_piwb_hr_content.HRSD_PIWBUtilsSNC</api_name>
        <caller_access>2</caller_access>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>HRSD_PIWBUtilsSNC</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var HRSD_PIWBUtilsSNC = Class.create();
HRSD_PIWBUtilsSNC.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {},

    updateAIConfiguration: function(pISolutionModel) {
        var useCaseTemplate = pISolutionModel.usecase.template;
        var HRAIConfigRecord = sn_hr_core.hr.AICONFIG_TO_USECASETEMPLATE[useCaseTemplate];
        if (gs.nil(HRAIConfigRecord))
            return;
        var mlSolDef = new GlideRecord('ml_capability_definition_base');
		mlSolDef.addActiveQuery();
        mlSolDef.addQuery('solution_name', pISolutionModel.ml_model_solution_name);
        mlSolDef.setLimit(1);
        mlSolDef.query();
        if (mlSolDef.next()) 
            new sn_hr_core.MLToAIConfigUtils.updateHRAIConfiguration(HRAIConfigRecord, mlSolDef.getUniqueValue());
        else {
            gs.error("Solution does not exist");
            return;
        }
    },

    type: 'HRSD_PIWBUtilsSNC'
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>maint</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2020-04-11 20:29:39</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>086c7f2a89c45010f877b0344bd97ef5</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>28</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>HRSD_PIWBUtilsSNC</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Predictive Intelligence Workbench HRSD content" source="sn_piwb_hr_content">6770cb2bc0ffc010f877e710c8f30457</sys_package>
        <sys_policy>read</sys_policy>
        <sys_scope display_value="Predictive Intelligence Workbench HRSD content">6770cb2bc0ffc010f877e710c8f30457</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_086c7f2a89c45010f877b0344bd97ef5</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>maint</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2020-04-12 14:03:17</sys_updated_on>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
